name: Project Boids
description:
Description:

Project Boids is a wave based survival game where you must survive against hordes of "Boids", anthropomorphic bird-like entities. That grow in numbers with every wave.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left click - Shoot

Left shift - Run

R - Reload

Space - Jump

Made for the 2021 IEEE CIC x GMU Indie Game Jam

Audio from SONNISS's GDC archive, and Still North Media.
